scripts.prerun: npm run del-next-cache && npm run i18n && npm run roots
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run prerun && next build
scripts.windeployPROD: del out.tar && 7z a -bb3 -ttar out.tar out && ssh elias@31.133.100.204 "bash -c 'mkdir -p /DOCKER/httpd-getcounts/site && rm -rfv /DOCKER/httpd-getcounts/site/*'" && scp -v out.tar elias@31.133.100.204:/tmp && ssh elias@31.133.100.204 "bash -c 'rm -rf /tmp/out && tar -xf /tmp/out.tar -C /tmp && mv -v /tmp/out/* /DOCKER/httpd-getcounts/site/ && ls -R /DOCKER/httpd-getcounts/site'"
scripts.windeploydev: cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_DEV_BUILD=true npm run builddev && del out.tar && 7z a -bb3 -ttar out.tar out && ssh elias@31.133.100.204 rm -rf /DOCKER/dev-httpd/site/getcounts-live && scp -v out.tar elias@31.133.100.204:/tmp && ssh elias@31.133.100.204 "rm -rf /tmp/out && tar -xf /tmp/out.tar -C /tmp && mv -v /tmp/out /DOCKER/dev-httpd/site/getcounts-live && ls -R /DOCKER/dev-httpd/site/getcounts-live"
